subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Milwaukee Braves’ right-hander beat the Yankees three times in the 1957 World Series in one of the most dominant pitching performances in baseball’s postseason history.
snippet: The Milwaukee Braves’ right-hander beat the Yankees three times in the 1957 World Series in one of the most dominant pitching performances in baseball’s postseason history.
